Key Match Events: Clase reached base four times and hit his first career home run
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. doubled and came around on a Kirk double
Kirk drove in both runners by smacking a ball off the wall near the right-field corner
Clase hit a two-run shot in the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: Recent call-up Jonatan Clase was given an opportunity to lead off for the Toronto Blue Jays
Manager John Schneider emphasized Clase's power and speed
Kevin Gausman threw six strong innings
Alejandro Kirk drove in three runs
Post-Match Reflections: Clase expressed pride in helping his team
Gausman (14-11) allowed four hits and one earned run for his third straight victory
Kirkâ€™s 17-game hitting streak is a career high and the longest active streak in the American League
Miscellaneous Highlights: Clase was acquired from Seattle last July in the deadline deal that saw reliever Yimi Garcia go to the Mariners
He was recalled from Triple-A Buffalo last week
The Blue Jays nearly ended Richard Fitts' streak in the first inning
